section.title: Importing Virtual Machines from Imported Data Storage Domains
section.para: Import a virtual machine from a data storage domain you have imported into your Red Hat Virtualization environment. This procedure assumes that the imported data storage domain has been attached to a data center and has been activated.

procedure.title: Importing Virtual Machines from an Imported Data Storage Domain

step.para: Click the imported data storage domain.
Click the VM Import tab in the details pane.
Select one or more virtual machines to import.
Select the cluster into which the virtual machines are imported from the Cluster list.

section.para: You have imported one or more virtual machines into your environment. The imported virtual machines no longer appear in the list under the VM Import tab.
